name: Original Diner Do Not Steal
description:
A short visual novel featuring the original characters of my friends. As regulars to a particular diner, they all have specific tastes that are catered to here, and now you, the newest addition to the wait staff, have to learn what these weirdos want to eat.

Design, Art, and Music by me.

Featuring OCs from myself, Alex Perkins, Camille Rollapoid, Kam White, and Jordan Hamann.

Made in tyranobuilder, font is Gosub by pixelsagas.
